name: INPHO: Advance Course on Gravitation
description: In this course, Nitin Sachan will provide in-depth knowledge of Gravitation. The course will be helpful for aspirants preparing for IIT JEE. Learners at any stage of their preparation will be benefited from the course. All doubts related to the topic will be clarified during the doubt clearing sessions in the course. Class dates and timings along with topic details are given below. The course will be covered in Hindi and the notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Newton's Law of Gravitation, Central Force & its Application
Applications of Central Force and Gravitational Field
Gravitation - Part IV & Doubt Clearing Session
Newton’s law and Application of Kepler's for Motion of Planets
Gravitational Potential Energy, Planar Motion and its Application
Gravitational Force, Potential Energy & Problem Solving
